column4: how can i upgrade from dapper to edgy using a cd? i've apt-cdrom add'd in my edgy cd, apt-get update and apt-get dist-upgrade doesn't work though. what have i missed? (im using kubuntu)
did you comment out the other repos and just have the cdrom repo enabled
yeah
my sources.list only contains the cd...
is the cdrom edgy?
yup
the cd you have is edgy?
yes it's deffinitely edgy
does the md5sum match?
is the cd good?
yea on both
did you run sudo apt-get update?
is it perhaps because it's kubuntu, rather than ubuntu.... (obviously the different packages on the cd would modify the hash...)
the cd is the same that you have installed?
i've got  kubuntu dapper installed, trying to upgrade to edgy using a kubuntu edgy cd
and you ran the update command?
is this livecd or alternate?
it's the livecd
you cant use it to upgrade
just clean install you need alternate to upgrade
ah damnit, that explains a bit. thanks.
